byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MAGGIE HABERMAN

lead_paragraph: The governor spoke on Thursday at the annual New Jersey Legislative Correspondents Club Show, making fun of the press and some of the unpleasant moments of his time in office.

headline.print_headline: Christie Teases New Jersey News Media With Profanity, Jokes and Taunts (for Charity)
headline.main: Chris Christie Teases New Jersey News Media With Profanity, Jokes and Taunts (for Charity)

snippet: The governor spoke on Thursday at the annual New Jersey Legislative Correspondents Club Show, making fun of the press and some of the unpleasant moments of his time in office.
abstract: New Jersey Gov Chris Christie gives unexpectedly uncensored, profanity-laced speech at annual New Jersey Legislative Correspondents Club Show; speech offers candid, and negative, view of Christie's feelings toward news media.
